little things

Optimize reading code


Handle duplicate schemaVersion field if schemaVersion is first field


Optimize parts of exhaustive schemaVersion search

This fully delegates checks of duplicate mismatched `schemaVersion` values to the metadata parsers and inlines some logic to be more efficient.
Actual catch new parsing errors


spell correction


And it's super-minimized gson now


This commented aged like milk


Use input stream reader instead


Exclude gson from licenser


Specify changes to Gson per apache 2.0


More unit tests

Adds a typical mod test case.

timeline.author: sfPlayer1

timeline.bodyText: Is toString being called during normal operation? If not, I'd move the string assembly to toString
timeline.author: sfPlayer1
sfPlayer1

timeline.bodyText: A single try-with-resource and a single variable should suffice. They all close the parent.

timeline.message: Resolve review requests and add warning message system
Add Fabric copyright to modified gson files

timeline.bodyText: Hmm, does this need deprecation since it's not in an API class? (edit: this wasn't supposed to be a suggest changes review, oops)
timeline.author: Juuxel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -50,6 +50,14 @@ public CustomValue getCustomValue(String key) {
 		return getCustomValues().get(key);
 	}
 
+	/**
+	 * Converts a custom value to a json element.
+	 * This will be removed in a future version when we remove the gson dependency.
+	 *
+	 * @param value the custom value
+	 * @return a json element
+	 */
+	@Deprecated

replies.bodyText: It's really just a marker for the future when gson gets fully dropped
replies.author: i509VCB

timeline.bodyText: Can this now be done? or do we need to repackage it in mixin? (Id like to repackage all of mixins libs, possibly appart from asm)
timeline.author: modmuss50

replies.bodyText: I asked player about that. He wants to deal with the actual removal of gson and it's corresponding exemption a bit later.
